Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2009 07:06AM gladtobehere wrote: i was down to once a year aftere a rt lumpectomy; just about 1  year out of double mx now; never had drugs or chemo, so when i asked to see the team onc after recovery, nobody quite knew why.  info he gave me was to keep see gyn and be sure to get 5 yr colonoscopies.  not sure what the BS is going to say.  He's no longer on my fav doc list after the second surgery scars and dismissive attitude towards pain - I was early stage the first time as well, but the DCIS this past year (first was 2/98) was in the same breast.  thanks for your post.  company is a good thing :)
Posts.Title: How long do I continue with breast surgeon? jbau Erica
